description: Applys the root configuration for CD4PE. Full documentation at http://docs-internal.puppet.com/docs/continuous-delivery/2.x-dev/install_module.html#task-7157

resolvable_hostname.description: A resolvable internet address where the Continuous Delivery for PE server can be reached. Required only if the agent certificate is not the machine's resolvable internet address.

root_email.description: The email address to associate with the root account.

root_password.description: The password to associate with the root account.

web_ui_endpoint.description: The endpoint where the web UI can be reached, in the form http://<resolvable_hostname>:<port>. Required if you set the web_ui_port parameter in the cd4pe class during installation.

backend_service_endpoint.description: The endpoint where the back end service can be reached, in the form http://<resolvable_hostname>:<port>. Required if you set the backend_service_port parameter in the cd4pe class during installation.

agent_service_endpoint.description: The endpoint where the agent service can be reached, in the form http://<resolvable_hostname>:<port>. Required if you set the agent_service_port parameter in the cd4pe class during installation.

storage_provider.description: Which object store provider to use. Must be one of: DISK, ARTIFACTORY or S3. Defaults to DISK.

storage_endpoint.description: The URL of the storage provider. Required if using Amazon S3 or Artifactory for object storage.

storage_bucket.description: The name of the bucket used for object storage. Required if using Amazon S3 or Artifactory for object storage.

storage_prefix.description: For Amazon S3: the subdirectory of the bucket to use. For Artifactory: the top level of the Artifactory instance.

s3_access_key.description: The AWS access key that has access to the bucket. Required if using Amazon S3.

s3_secret_key.description: The AWS secret key that has access to the bucket. Required if using Amazon S3.

artifactory_access_token.description: API token for your Artifactory instance. Required if using Artifactory.
